data.name: Project Gunship
data.detailed_description:
Destruction



Enemy targets certainly can run, but they can't hide. Showcase the power of your weapons by tearing buildings apart, in our destructible environments.


AC-130 Weapons & Munitions

Explore and utilize the different lethal weapons and munitions utilized on AC-130s throughout history.

From the 7.62x51mm GAU-2A mini-gun utilized on the first gunship variant (AC-130A "Project Gunship II")



To the pin-point accurate, laser guided AGM-114 Hellfire Missile featured on the latest variant (AC-130J "Ghostrider")



With these weapons comes a variety of ammunition types that offer differing strengths and weakness. From high explosive incendiary rounds, armor-piercing rounds, to air burst high explosive rounds - you are responsible for deciding which to use to effectively destroy your target.


Unscripted AI

We believe dynamic AI is important to establish replay-ability. This means our AI is built to react circumstantially to what is going on around them and will therefore, have different reactions no matter how many times you play and replay a scenario.






Infestation

No better way to showcase an AC-130's power by protecting friendly units from a zombie invasion!


About the Game

Project Gunship is a single-player, AC-130 simulation game, showcasing AC-130 variants used throughout history. Be prepared to engage enemy infantry, vehicles, and destructible buildings with a variety of weapons and munitions.

Key Features
  • Destructible Environments - Watch buildings crumble into pieces as you hammer them with 105mm high explosives
  • Weapons & Munitions - Choose from a variety of weapons & munitions to engage the enemy with. Each serving a specific purpose, choose the right tool for the right job.
  • Dynamic Game play - AI reactions will be different every time. Play and replay scenarios with a different result
  • Infestation - Ease some tension by squeezing the trigger against hordes of incoming zombies

data.short_description: Rain hell on the enemy from 12,000 feet in an AC-130 Gunship. Project Gunship provides an authentic and historical simulation of combat in all gunship variants from Vietnam to present day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i or AMD Ryzen with 4 physical cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 with at least 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i or AMD Ryzen with 6 physical cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon 570 with at least 6GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence and gore are a common occurrence in Project Gunship. Throwing high explosives at soft targets tends to dismember and since we were able to replicate the infrared camera view well, game footage often looks very realistic and comparable to real world combat footage.
